/** @format */import React from"react";import logo from"../images/logo.png";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{getAllMovies,getAllMovieSearch}from"../Redux/actions/moviesAction";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Nav=()=>{const onSearch=word=>{SearchMovie(word);};const dispatchAllMoveis=useDispatch();// search movie
